name: Dr. Riya Mehra
details: Expert in heart surgeries and cardiovascular diseases. Over 10 years of experience.

name: Dr. Rahul Sharma
details: Treats acne, rashes, and chronic skin diseases. Practicing since 2014.

name: Dr. Sneha Iyer
details: Loves working with children. Known for her gentle and effective approach.

name: Dr. Arjun Kapoor
details: Specialist in treating nervous system disorders and epilepsy.

name: Dr. Ananya Rao
details: Over 15 years of experience in women's health and prenatal care.

name: Dr. Karan Patel
details: Specializes in bone and joint issues, including sports injuries.

name: Dr. Meenal Aggarwal
details: Focuses on mental wellness and counseling. Expert in treating anxiety and depression.

name: Dr. Vikram Sethi
details: Deals with general health checkups and common illnesses. Trusted by families for over a decade.
